Articles.Content:
All right, can't wait to play with all of the new things this we-

*Has lost all permissions to play on electronics due to missing homework*

Crud.

I know. That feel.
Thanks again, Squad, for another awesome update!

Awesome thanks it would have been good for the info on planets only to be available after landing or orbiting

Remember that this is Sandbox mode, the 'cheating' mode. Once they introduce Career mode, you likely will have to discover planets before you can even see them.
I like the info added in the map view, and the stupidity rating on each of the kerbals!

Oh, They released it when I was about to go to sleep (22:00 in England), now it's morning and I have to go to school for 6 hours, then I will play KSP. I have to wait under 24 hours after release to play it But good job I like the pictures
Anyone experiencing a bug that prevents you from going to the space center or ending a flight?
Well, that just happened

Anyone experiencing a bug that prevents you from going to the space center or ending a flight?

I haven't but if you're running any mods not officially updated for .20 yet, I'd be looking at those pretty closely.

A lot of people seem to be thinking that it's going to be a simple matter of copying over their favorite mods from .19, but the fact of the matter is that a lot of things have changed about how the game loads custom parts and mods now.

Otherwise if you don't have any mods, try a reinstall?
How Slim's Crazy Cousin Jeb Learned to Love The Bomb
I am by far most excited by the 2 new RC probe cores and the map filtering function.

I'm personally happiest with the interface updates. Being able to filter out debris is great! Now I no longer need to feel guilty for leaving it in orbit, which will not in any way come back to bite me in the rear.

Dang, I just got to school, time to plane how to launch Jeb when I get home

I'm sooooo excited!!!!
I love the new medium engine, now my insertion stages are no longer too powerful with the mainsail or too weak with the Lv 909.
First the VAB then all the worlds.

"Adding K to every word..."

Nova let this get through?

Finally downloaded, that was a pain in the **s. But it's really nice update, love the new parts! And btw, does someone noticed that the planets on loading thingie rotate backwards? (usually if I see some animation of planet orbits the thick line is behind the planet as the planet rotating is drawing it..) But that's nothing in gameplay, just a visual notice

Finally downloaded, that was a pain in the **s. But it's really nice update, love the new parts! And btw, does someone noticed that the planets on loading thingie rotate backwards? (usually if I see some animation of planet orbits the thick line is behind the planet as the planet rotating is drawing it..) But that's nothing in gameplay, just a visual notice

Noticed that too. Dunno why.

when i go to the ksp store to download this version it says "transferred to steam" is there no way for me to get .20 except through steam now that i activated the key for it?

Correct. This was stated in the FAQ when the Steam keys came out.

-Lego
Why this always happens when I'm near finals?
I had to study sql tonight and prepare the work:D

am i the only one who thought of this when they saw the seats

ejector seats!

How Slim's Crazy Cousin Jeb Learned to Love The Bomb

Pareidolia is killing me..

Edited May 23, 2013 by nothke

is it not able to be downloaded from the store yet? because my steam version updated but i dont see a button that lets me download from the ksp store

If you transferred to steam, you lost access to updates via the store and have to get them through steam from then on.. This was stated, several times, in the process of transferring to steam.

when i go to the ksp store to download this version it says "transferred to steam" is there no way for me to get .20 except through steam now that i activated the key for it?

Correct. See above.
Downloading KSP 0.20 right now.
Downloaded it. HOORAY!
